name: Ext_R4B_Task_reasonCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Task.reasonCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Task.reasonCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.
element.comment: `Task.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Task.reason`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo. `Task.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Task.reason`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *).
